alert.note: Alert for Pickens (Alabama) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 26 at 7:20PM CDT by NWS Birmingham
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of northwestern Tuscaloosa, Pickens and southwestern Fayette Counties through 800 PM CDT... At 720 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from 6 miles northeast of Ashcraft Corner to near Reform to near Ethelsville. Movement was south at 10 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Gordo, Reform, Carrollton, Pickensville, Ethelsville, Memphis, McMullen, Garden, Ashcraft Corner, Bevill Lock And Dam, Dillburg, Moores Bridge, North Pickens Airport, McShan, Owens, Echola, Lubbub, Macedonia and Kirk. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
